txt.en: 'My favourite dagger was stolen by half-orcs, and I want it back! I think one of their captains must have it by now, over there in Nímbarth. Get it back for me and I'll reward you, see if I don't!'
Collect Tesni's dagger from one of the half-orc captains at Nímbarth
Tesni's favourite dagger was stolen by half-orcs, and she wants it back.

'You got it back! I never doubted you, [placeholder], but I have to say: this dagger has seen better days. Look at all the dried blood on the blade! I don't want to think about whose blood this might be.\n\n'Ah, I don't think this dagger is my favourite anymore. I did promise you a reward, and I will not go back on my word. It is a shame, though. It was such a nice dagger.'
Collected a blood-stained dagger. Is this Tesni's favourite?
One of the half-orc captains at Nímbarth might have Tesni's dagger.
Tesni watches over Nímbarth from a safe distance.
'My favourite dagger was stolen by half-orcs, and I want it back! I think one of their captains must have it by now, over there in Nímbarth. Get it back for me and I'll reward you, see if I don't!'
Bring the blood-stained dagger to Tesni west of Nímbarth
